name: Irrational Behaviour
description: Irrational Behaviour is a script that explores themes of illogical actions and unpredictable behavior. Characters have abilities that defy conventional logic and reasoning.
author: Josh
specialRules: Focus on illogical and unpredictable behavior
Explores concepts of irrationality and chaos
setupNotes: This script embraces irrationality and unpredictability. Players should expect abilities that challenge logical thinking and conventional gameplay.

winConditions.evil: Survive to equal the number of good players

howToRun: Chaotic actions with logical resolution. State edge-case rulings upfront. Keep night order strict so “irrational” stays fair.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Separate noise from signal by aggregating over days. Evil: Add just-enough noise to make real contradictions look random.
bluffing: Blame oddities on the script; keep your story stable.
